Hero.title: Create Beautiful Family Newspapers
Hero.description: Transform your family's precious moments into stunning printed newspapers. Collaborate with loved ones to create personalized stories that connect generations.

Features.title: Why Families Love Kopkuabook?
Features.family_collaboration_desc: Invite family members to contribute photos, stories, and memories to create together.
Features.beautiful_layout_desc: Professional newspaper layout that make your family moments look stunning in print.
Features.delivered_monthly_desc: Receive beautifully printed newspapers delivered directly to your loved ones' doorstep.
Features.personal_touch_desc: Customize every aspect with personal messages, family recipes, and special announcements.
Features.precious_memories_desc: Preserve and share your family's most treasured moments in a tangible, lasting format.
Features.easy_to_add_photo_desc: Fast photo upload or drag-and-drop makes it easy for everyone in the family to contribute.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our products and services.
FAQ.return_policy_a: You can return unused items in their original packaging within 30 days for a refund or exchange. Contact support for assistance.
FAQ.track_order_q: How do I track my order?
FAQ.track_order_a: Track your order using the link provided in your confirmation email, or log into your account to view tracking details.
FAQ.shipping_a: Yes, we ship worldwide. Shipping fees and delivery times vary by location, and customs duties may apply for some countries.
FAQ.payment_q: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQ.payment_a: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay, ensuring secure payment options for all customers.
FAQ.damaged_item_q: What if I receive a damaged item?
FAQ.damaged_item_a: Please contact our support team within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the damaged item. We'll arrange a replacement or refund.
FAQ.support_q: How can I contact customer support?
FAQ.support_a: You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com or through the live chat on our website. We're available 24/7 to assist you.

Footer.company_description: Bringing families closer together through beautiful printed newspapers.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
